result.Case Summary: FINANCIAL INDUSTRY REGULATORY AUTHORITY  OFFICE OF HEARING OFFICERS DEPARTMENT OF ENFORCEMENT,  Complainant,  v.  BRIAN CAMPBELL  (CRD No. 2297936), Respondent. Disciplinary Proceeding No. 2010023065601 Hearing Officer - SNB  DEFAULT DECISION February 5, 2013  Respondent is barred from associating with any FINRA member firm in any     capacity for failing to provide a complete response to requests for documents and information, in violation of FINRA Rules 8210 and 2010.
